talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
If you didn't step forward... I would have approached the matter in a different way to conciliate the princess.
But I never intended to abandon the refugees. All refugees from the Aergal Kingdom are welcome here.
Just as I said to you earlier, {user_nick}.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9921_sp_05.ogg}
I know that you have a good will, {user_nick}.
However, I had to make use that good will, and for that I am sorry.

${user_nick}$
Oh, not at all! I'm happy to know you have such a high opinion of me… I was just surprised to see you so apparently willing
to coldly abandon the people of Aergal…… But it was all a deliberate negotiation tactic. I'm glad to hear that.
(I should have known. I almost got Norfe completely wrong.)

$Princess Sylvania$
………….

$Geraint$
………………

$Injured Refugee$
……………..

$Norfe$
I'm glad we were able to resolve this misunderstanding. But more importantly… we learned that Princess Sylvania
clearly knows something about the Cup of Healing Lid. She brought it up as a trade chip on her own, after all.

${user_nick}$
Right. Considering she said she would help look into the matter... It's a shame to have had to use the refugees, but...
it's also nice to know we have another potential lead. We need to find out how to use it as soon as possible...

$Norfe$
There's no need to be impatient. We'll find a way soon.

$Norfe$
By now, all the refugees in Aergal who came with the princess would have received supplies.
This is a good time to go to the princess and find out about the lid, {user_nick}.

$Princess Sylvania$
………….

$Norfe$
I will be listening in on the conversation from here through the hologram.

※ Find Princess Sylvania and ask her about the Cup of Healing Lid.

$Hologram Norfe$
We will take care of the refugees who arrived with you, so you have no need to worry.

$Princess Sylvania$
I'll skip going out of my way to thank you. It's not as if you're doing this out of the kindness of your heart.

$Hologram Norfe$
Please allow me to apologize for that. We simply needed some kind of guarantee of our own safety.

$Princess Sylvania$
Tsk. Well, anyway… Oh, {user_nick}, were you off somewhere?

${user_nick}$
I had somewhere to be momentarily… Were you looking for me?

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_01.ogg}
I realized that I forget to express my gratitude for earlier. Thank you.
Because of you, the people of Aergal are safe. I know this isn't much, but…

${user_nick}$
Don't mention it. My role was minor... Your determination to look after your people was critical.
Besides… It isn't as if we just accepted the refugees for nothing… (In a way, I played a part in tricking the princess.…)

$Princess Sylvania$
But it was thanks to you that I found my courage!
And I remembered you mentioning the Cup of Healing Lid.

${user_nick}$
Is that so…?
Then does that mean you will help us find the Cup of Healing Lid now? We have been looking for the lid for some time...

$Princess Sylvania$
Actually, I was wondering why you were seeking such a thing in the first place.
They call it a relic, but in reality it's just a lump of metal with a few frills.

${user_nick}$
Well... (Just how much should I tell her?) There is someone we want to try healing using the cup.
(Actually, it's a dragon, but… There's also Shalica, too.) And to do that……

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_02.ogg}
Ahhh... Then it's for a good cause? (She takes out something that looks like a key.)
Here, this is the Cup of Healing Lid. It's what you were looking for, right?

${user_nick}$
Huh??

$Hologram Norfe$
……….

${user_nick}$
Hey… Wait a minute! Does this mean you were playing dumb and had it the whole time?!!?!?

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_03.ogg}
I didn't know why you wanted the lid, so how could I hand it over so easily,
even if it is just an old relic? Whatever my reasons, isn't the fact that you have it now all that matters?

${user_nick}$
Well… Yeah, but...!

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_04.ogg}
Anyway, you got what you wanted, right?
Go ahead, take it. I feel comfortable entrusting it to you. I like you.
There aren't many good people like you in this world. Just don't tell me you planned that speech in advance to win me over.

${user_nick}$
(Well, the speech was authentic, but… I guess that was Norfe's plan…)

$Princess Sylvania$
What are you doing? Aren't you going to take it?

$Hologram Norfe${sound:npc_Hologram_Norphee_qu9922_sp_01.ogg}
Well, well, well… You had the Cup of Healing Lid the whole time.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_05.ogg}
Oh, did I not mention that I had the lid?
I said I would help you find it, so I wasn't lying or anything.
Didn't you guys try to manipulate me into this in the first place? In that case, I'd say we're even.

$Hologram Norfe$
… True enough. {user_nick}, Geraint has already departed, so take the lid and go meet him.

${user_nick}$
(I never imagined getting the lid would be this easy...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Attaches the lid to the cup.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Is that the lid? Here's the cup. Let's put them together.
Then we can see about actually using the cup.

${user_nick}$
……….

$Geraint$
……….

$Grele$
……….

$Cup of Healing$
(Nothing happened.)

${user_nick}$
Why isn't it doing anything?? I'm sure we assembled it properly.

$Grele$
Don't tell me it's missing another part?

${user_nick}$
Geraint, do we need something else?

$Geraint$
Beats me. Maybe that princess is just lying. The lid might be a forgery, or...

${user_nick}$
I can't imagine it's fake…

$Princess Sylvania$
Hey, do you honestly think I would give you a forgery?
The suggestion alone is insulting, you know. You think my word as a negotiator means so little?

$Princess Sylvania$
Actually, I was wondering why you were only asking for the lid specifically...
You guys had the body the whole time, huh?

${user_nick}$
Somehow... Wait, do you know why it isn't working?

$Princess Sylvania$
I've never seen the cup before either…
So all I know about it is that it was kept in safekeeping in Aergal for a long time.
And, considering you finally got the Cup of Healing Lid you wanted, isn't that enough? I think my work here is done.

${user_nick}$
But you promised to get information on the Cup of Healing for us. We don't know anything about it,
and we heard that information on its usage could be found in Aergal Kingdom... Please help us look into how to use the cup.

$Princess Sylvania$
If I do... What will you give me? I already traded the lid for the refugees.
Don't you agree that I deserve something in return?

${user_nick}$
Well... (I can't exactly make any commitments on behalf of Rhadames…)

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_06.ogg}
If you can't decide, how about I make the first proposal? I want to know why Aergal collapsed.
If you help me investigate the cause and who did it, I'll help you too.

${user_nick}$
That actually might work… We may find that out naturally as we continue to look into the cup anyway...

$Hologram Norfe$
Indeed. Like {user_nick} said, as we investigate the usage of the Cup of Healing Lid, we may be able to learn
concrete details about who destroyed Aergal Kingdom. If we do, we will be sure to let you know.

$Princess Sylvania$
Good then. I trust you won't change your tune later on?

$Princess Sylvania$
There is something I can tell you from the outset...
Information on the use of Cup of Healing would have been engraved on the stone tablets of the Aergal Museum.
I actually remember some of them.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_07.ogg}
There was one that seemed like a warning… Something like, "Do not use the cup if you are not prepared to lose everything."
In fact, my father pointed to it and said it would be better to call it a "Cup of Curses" than of healing.

$Princess Sylvania$
There is probably a lot more written down on those tablets.
Unfortunately, those tablets would have been buried in the rubble when Aergal caved in.
And the same goes for the ancient books where the content of the stone tablets was transcribed.

${user_nick}$
No way… Then what about people who are knowledgeable about the Cup of Healing Lid?

$Princess Sylvania$
There probably aren't any. Why would anyone bother memorizing those tablets?

$Princess's Maid$
Beggin' your pardon, Princess… But I don't think the ancient books would have all been destroyed.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9922_sp_08.ogg}
What? … Oh, that's right! How could I have forgotten? It's not like there's no hope.
Aergal Kingdom always stored valuable documents in its archive.
Just in case.

$Princess Sylvania$
If they were in the archive… It's quite possible they weren't destroyed!

$Hologram Norfe$
In that case, we just need to find someone familiar with the archive.

$Princess Sylvania$
Sure, anyone who worked at the archive would know what happened to the documents.
Maybe they brought some with them. After all, the scholars who worked at the archive... were pretty crazy about books.

$Hologram Norfe$
We will have to look into the refugees in Rhadames, then.
Just in case, Geraint, please check the Nest in Foggy Black Lake.
There might be some records left behind there by Rubinart.

$Hologram Norfe$
Grele, please check to see if there were any refugees left behind in Vulcan Swamp,
and if any of them know about the ancient books or the archive.

$Hologram Norfe$
And {user_nick} and the princess should ask around among the refugees in Rhadames.
Someone may have a lead, obviously.
You probably won't find it difficult to ask around since you've already become acquainted with some refugees.

$Grele$
Sure, will do.

${user_nick}$
Princess, do you know anyone who worked in the archive? Maybe some of their characteristics to look for...?
It would be great if we could narrow the search down with so many refugees here.

$Princess Sylvania$
Characteristics? Well... There were a lot of people who worked in the archive, so it would be hard to identify any particular characteristics.
Still, many of the scholars there were crazy about books. So much so that they
might even put themselves at risk to protect those old tomes.

$Princess Sylvania$
Their obsession with books... It's actually kind of frightening. (Sighs briefly and shakes head.)

$Princess Sylvania$
Besides, they tend to spend most of their time transcribing books. That's the main purpose of the archive, after all.
Maybe that's why some people think of them as librarians.

${user_nick}$
They sacrifice themselves for their books? And transcribe texts... Could it be?

$Princess Sylvania$
Oh? Do you have someone in mind?

${user_nick}$
Indeed! I'm not certain, but there was one refugee who hurt his back trying to protect some books!
He even said he worked as a transcriber of texts…

$Princess Sylvania$
He sacrificed himself for his books?
Then he might be an employee of the archive! We have nothing to lose, so let's just go!

${user_nick}$
Okay!!

※ Talk to the refugee of Aergal in Rhadames.

$Injured Refugee${sound:npc_Refugee4_qu9922_sp_01.ogg}
Oh, it's my benefactor from before. Thanks to the medicine you gave me earlier, my back feels a little better.
But…. What brings you here? And isn't that… the princess!?

$Princess Sylvania$
Huh? Oh, who's this? Well, if it isn't Tom! You're safe!

$Injured Refugee$
Fortunately, I was able to get out before it collapsed. The most important thing is you're safe, Princess.
I was so worried when I saw your handmaid going to Aergal the other day. But, what brings you two here together...?

$Princess Sylvania$
We're here looking for an archivist... It seems our search is over!
Tom here held quite a lofty position in the archive, {user_nick}. He may know something!

${user_nick}$
Really? (But I already basically asked him about this when I was applying the medicine…)
Do you happen to have a copy of one of the ancient books on the Cup of Healing in your collection? I heard they were kept at the archive…

$Injured Refugee$
A copy of such a book... I'm sure it must be among the luggage I packed before the fall of Aergal
and the collapse of the archive and palace.

$Injured Refugee$
Give me a moment. (Searches luggage.)

$Injured Refugee${sound:npc_Refugee4_qu9922_sp_02.ogg}
Uh… Huh? Where did it go?
… AHHHHH!!!!

${user_nick}$
What's wrong!?

$Injured Refugee$
The box with the ancient book transcriptions…… The box….!!
No! Was that the box that I dropped while passing through the Red Waste!?

${user_nick}$
What??! You dropped it???

$Princess Sylvania$
What do you mean, you dropped it while passing through the Waste? Did you lose the book?!

$Injured Refugee$
It seems so... AHHHH!! I thought it was just a box of daily necessities and let it go!!

$Injured Refugee${sound:npc_Refugee4_qu9922_sp_03.ogg}
Please find that box! You have no idea how precious those books are…
If those ignorant brigands find the box they'll likely just use the books as fire-starter. We must stop them!!!

$Injured Refugee$
My benefactor! Can you go to the Red Waste and find those ancient books?!
They're in a very small, red box.

$Princess Sylvania$
So we found the archivist quickly, only to find out the ancient books might have been lost for good…?

${user_nick}$
Now what do we do?

$Princess Sylvania$
What else? We must go look for the book! The Red Waste is that
desert over there, right? Is it dangerous?

${user_nick}$
It's not that. It's those stupid brigands there...
I just hope they don't do something dumb with the books….

$Grele$
What is this? A clue, perhaps?

${user_nick}$
Huh? Grele?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: A Resolved Misunderstanding
journal.contents:
Luckily, negotiations between Princess Sylvania and Norfe ended well. But why did Norfe say what he said to Princess Sylvania? Go to Norfe and ask him about it.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Cup of Healing Lid
journal.contents:
You resolved the misunderstanding with Norfe. Now go to Princess Sylvania and find out more information about the Cup of Healing Lid.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: Learn about the Cup of Healing from Princess Sylvania
journal.todo_msg: Ask Princess Sylvania about the Cup of Healing.

journal.title: Cup of Healing
journal.contents:
The princess had the Cup of Healing Lid the whole time! You got the lid from the princess. Speak with Geraint. The time has come to attach the lid to the Cup of Healing!

Rhadames - Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Get the Cup of Healing from Geraint.

journal.title: Unresponsive Cup of Healing
journal.contents:
Even after attaching the lid to the Cup of Healing, nothing happened. Is it missing yet another part? Ask Princess Sylvania if she knows how to use the Cup of Healing Lid.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.todo_msg: Ask Princess Sylvania about the Cup of Healing.

journal.title: Finding the Ancient Book Ⅰ
journal.contents:
According to Princess Sylvania, the archive of Aergal Kingdom was home to various transcripts of ancient books. Maybe a copy of the Ancient Book was in the archives, too! You recently met a refugee who matched the characteristics of an employees at the archives. Go ask the Injured Refugee about the archive and the Ancient Book!

Rhadames - Injured Refugee

journal.title: Finding the Ancient Book Ⅱ
journal.contents:
You found out the location of the Ancient Book transcript, and it turns out it was dropped in the Red Waste, of all places. Speak with Princess Sylvania about what to do next.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.todo_msg: Discuss the situation with Princess Sylvania.
